alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:18PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harding and northwestern Perkins Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 918 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Scranton, or 15 miles southeast of Bowman, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Harding and northwestern Perkins Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
